title: Bug 109718 - Large content in text item causes tips to show in one line
description: When inserting large content into a text item, the tips (tooltip) show the content in one line. This behavior is not expected.
OB: When I insert large content into a text item, the tooltip shows the content in one line.
EB: When I insert large content into a text item, the tooltip should adapt and display the content in the given format.
SR:

1. Insert a text item into the layout.
2. Input the following content: 'Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMENTDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4 CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTYFILE.
